mapper.select: (SELECT id, name, date, cumulative_power FROM device WHERE name = '${machineName}' AND date LIKE concat('%','${date}','%') ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 1) UNION ALL (SELECT id, name, date, cumulative_power FROM device WHERE name = '${machineName}' AND date LIKE concat('%','${date}','%') ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO predicted_data (name, date, cumulative_power) VALUES ( #{name}, #{date}, #{cumulativePower} )
